```{r echo=FALSE}
library(magrittr)

phast_summary <- params$phast_summary
phast_gff <- params$phast_gff
```

#### Prophages

These elements were annotated from the [PHAST database](http://phast.wishartlab.com/Download.html), using blastx and blastn methods.

* Files:
    * GFF: ``r phast_gff``
    * Summary table: ``r phast_summary``

Summary table overview:

```{r echo=FALSE, comment="", eval=TRUE}
df <- read.delim(phast_summary, header = TRUE, sep = "\t")
df
```
